A: Which prophesy came to pass with the birth of Jesus Christ years later? (a) The prophecy of the kingdom of God (b) The prophecy of the birth of Jesus (c) The prophecy of agony
Which Prophet foretold the birth of Jesus? (a) Isaiah (b) Jeremiah (c) Daniel
The meaning of Emmanuel illustrates that God is always _ (a) With us and around us every second, minute and hour (b) God always care for us (c) God always gives us life
God is the one who is always protecting and guiding us (a) True (b) False
What is the first attribute that the Prophet said His name shall be called? (a) Emmanuel (b) Wonderful (c) Counsellor
For us to serve God, expect Him to guide our path and comfort us, we must ask for His Holy Spirit to live in us (a) True (b) False
For unto us a child is born, unto us a Son is given, and the government shall be upon His _ (a) Hand (b) Head (c) Shoulder

And His name shall be called (a) Wonderful, Counselor, Jehovah, Everlasting God (b) Wonderful, Counselor, The Mighty God, Yahweh (c) Wonderful, Counselor, The Mighty God, The Everlasting Father, The Prince of Peace
On the day of Pentecost, the disciples of Jesus came together in a house in _ (a) Bethlehem (b) Rome (c) Jerusalem
As they were praying together, a _ came down suddenly from the sky like the rush of a powerful mighty wind, and filled the house (a) Manner (b) Angel (c) Voice
Who is the Holy Spirit? (a) God, living in us (b) God's Father (c) God's Commander
Was Jesus the type of Messiah the Jews expected? (a) True (b) False
The Bible says, God is a Spirit and those who worship Him must worship Him in spirit and in _ (a) Flesh (b) Tongue (c) Truth
Was the prophecy of Isaiah concerning Jesus fulfilled? (a) Yes, it was (b) No, it wasn't
After the Apostles were filled with the Holy Spirit, they received the power to kill their enemies (a) True (b) False
To be born again means one should be _ (a) Enter his mother's womb and be born (b) Be baptized with water (c) Free from poverty
A born again is someone who lives a Christ-like life, a person who follows all the principles and laws of Jesus Christ (a) True (b) False
Where in the bible can you find this statement? Jesus said unto him, I am the way, the truth and the life, no man cometh unto the Father, but by me (a) John 3:16 (b) Acts 4:12 (c) John 14:6
Who amongst the disciples of Jesus asked Jesus where He would be going from the world and how they could know the way? (a) Judas Iscariot (b) Simon Peter (c) Thomas
According to the material, Jesus is the way to the Father (a) True (b) False
We cannot see God, the Father, except we believe in Jesus (a) True (b) False
Jesus said one cannot see God except one is _ (a) Big (b) Tall (c) Born again
We can become born by _ (a) Going to church everyday (b) Giving our life to Christ through water of baptism (c) Preaching the word of God
A good _ is one who looks after a flock of sheep and gives his life for the sheep (a) Shepherd (b) Sheep (c) Military
All these are the qualities of a good shepherd, except _ (a) Kindness (b) Protection (c) Fear
Who is a good shepherd? (a) Jesus (b) Thomas (c) Judas
"I am a good shepherd; a good shepherd giveth his life for the sheep." Who made this statement? (a) Aboki (b) Jesus (c) Soldier
The bread of life is _ who came from God to this world (a) Jesus (b) Manna (c) Loaf
When we eat the physical bread, we get hungry again but when we have Jesus, the bread of life, we will be given spiritual satisfaction all the time (a) True (b) False
Who told the people that He is the Living bread of life? (a) Peter (b) Paul (c) Jesus

He warned them to be _________ since no one knows when He would come back

The bread of life is _________ who came from God down to this world
